Ragnar makes a big smile and pats Wheeljack vigorously in the back.

Ragnar: That's the spirit! Let's go! We will pick the parts and bring
them back here.

He transforms to mech mode and opens his comm.

Ragnar: Rodimus, me and Wheeljack are going to salvage ship parts so
we can try to build some sort of ship.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "I think so." Wheeljack asserts.  "If I can build a workable 
> exploration drone from loose junk, I think I can make a starship from 
> starship parts."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Ragnar: I might have something better. When the wave hit us, on 
> orbit
> > of Strana Mechty, the warship we were on was sent here with us too. 
> If
> > we can salvage some of the parts that crashed, we could make 
> something
> > out of it. Would you be able to do it?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "Not a shuttle per se," Jackie admits.  "But we might be able to 
> > > modify one of the escape pods."
> > >

> > > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
